description.english: Got Rank S in all acts.

description.spanish: Has conseguido la nota S en todos los actos.

description.english: Executed a trick with a seven-step combo or longer.
description.german: Du hast einen Trick mit einer Kombo von 7 oder mehr ausgeführt.
description.french: Tu as fait une figure avec un combo à sept pas ou plus.
description.italian: Hai eseguito un'acrobazia con una combo da 7 pose o più.
description.spanish: Has realizado una acrobacia con un combo de 7 pasos o más.
description.japanese: トリックでコンボを７回以上きめた

description.english: Defeated 100 enemies.
description.german: Du hast 100 Feinde besiegt.
description.french: Tu as battu 100 ennemis.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto 100 nemici.
description.spanish: Has derrotado a 100 enemigos.
description.japanese: エネミーを100体たおした

description.english: Reached the goal without dropping any of the rings you collected in GREEN HILL Act 1.
description.german: Du hast das Ziel von GREEN HILL Akt 1 erreicht, ohne einen gesammelten Ring zu verlieren.
description.french: Tu as atteint l'arrivée sans perdre une seule Ring dans GREEN HILL Acte 1.
description.italian: Hai tagliato il traguardo senza far cadere neanche un Ring che hai raccolto nell'Atto 1 di GREEN
description.spanish: Has llegado a la meta sin soltar ninguno de los Rings conseguidos en el acto 1 de GREEN HILL.
description.japanese: グリーンヒルAct1でとったリングをおとさずゴールへむかおう

description.english: Performed all of Sonic's actions in Act 2.
description.german: Du hast alle Moves von Sonic in Akt 2 ausgeführt.
description.french: Tu as effectué toutes les actions spéciales de Sonic dans l'Acte 2.
description.italian: Hai eseguito tutte le mosse di Sonic nell'Atto 2.
description.spanish: Has realizado todos los movimientos de Sonic en el acto 2.
description.japanese: Act2すべてのしゅるいのソニックのアクションをだした

description.english: Took no damage while defeating the final boss.
description.german: Du hast den letzten Boss besiegt, ohne Schaden zu nehmen.
description.french: Tu n'as encaissé aucun dégât lors de ton combat contre le Boss final.
description.italian: Non hai subito danni contro il boss finale.
description.spanish: Has derrotado al jefe final sin recibir daños.
description.japanese: ラスボスをノーダメージでたおした

description.english: Completed all of Sonic's friends' Challenges.
description.german: Du hast alle Herausforderungen von Sonics Freunden angenommen.
description.french: Tu as remporté tous les défis contre les amis de Sonic.
description.italian: Hai preso parte alle Sfide con tutti gli amici di Sonic.
description.spanish: Has hecho desafíos con todos los amigos de Sonic.
description.japanese: なかまのチャレンジActをすべてクリアした

description.english: Chatted with all of Sonic's friends you saved.
description.german: Du hast dich mit allen Freunden Sonics, die du gerettet hast, unterhalten.
description.french: Tu as discuté avec tous les amis de Sonic que tu as sauvés.
description.italian: Hai parlato con tutti gli amici di Sonic che hai salvato.
description.spanish: Has charlado con todos los amigos de Sonic a los que hayas salvado.
description.japanese: たすけたなかまぜんいんとはなしをした

description.english: Joined the rankings.
description.german: Du hast es in die Ranglisten geschafft.
description.french: Tu as rejoint le classement.
description.italian: Ti sei iscritto alle classifiche.
description.spanish: Has entrado en los Marcadores.
description.japanese: ランキングにさんかした

description.english: Participated in a 30 Second Trial.
description.german: Du hast an einem 30-Sekunden-Test teilgenommen.
description.french: Tu as fait un essai de 30 secondes.
description.italian: Hai partecipato ad una prova da 30 secondi.
description.spanish: Has participado en una prueba de 30 segundos.
description.japanese: 30秒コンテストにさんかをした

description.english: Found the spring hidden in GREEN HILL Act 1 and reached the goal with a Red Star Ring.
description.german: Versteckte Feder in GREEN HILL Akt 1 gefunden und das Ziel mit einem roten Sternenring erreicht.
description.french: Tu as trouvé le ressort caché avec une Ring Étoile rouge dans GREEN HILL Acte 1.
description.italian: Hai trovato la molla nascosta di GREEN HILL Atto 1 e tagliato il traguardo con un Ring Stella rossa.
description.spanish: Has encontrado el muelle oculto en el acto 1 de GREEN HILL y llegaste a la meta con un Ring estrella roja.
description.japanese: グリーンヒルゾーンのかくれたスプリングにアクセスした

displayName.spanish: El Agua me Estropea las Púas

description.english: Cleared CHEMICAL PLANT without entering the water.
description.german: Du hast CHEMICAL PLANT Akt 2 abgeschlossen, ohne das Wasser zu berühren.
description.french: Tu as terminé CHEMICAL PLANT Acte 2 sans rentrer dans l'eau.
description.italian: Hai superato l'Atto 2 di CHEMICAL PLANT senza entrare nell'acqua.
description.spanish: Has superado el acto 2 de CHEMICAL PLANT sin entrar en el agua.
description.japanese: ケミカルプラントゾーンでいちども水中にはいらずクリアした

description.english: Cleared SKY SANCTUARY without falling even once.
description.german: Du hast SKY SANCTUARY Akt 1 abgeschlossen, ohne herunterzufallen.
description.french: Tu as terminé SKY SANCTUARY Acte 1 sans tomber une seule fois.
description.italian: Hai superato l'Atto 1 di SKY SANCTUARY senza mai cadere.
description.spanish: Has superado el acto 1 de SKY SANCTUARY sin caerte ni una vez.
description.japanese: スカイサンクチュアリでいちどもおちてミスせずにクリアした

description.english: Got the Red Star Ring located on the shortcut route in SPEED HIGHWAY.
description.german: Du hast dir den roten Sternenring auf der Abkürzung in SPEED HIGHWAY Akt 2 geschnappt.
description.french: Tu as attrapé la Ring Étoile rouge située dans le raccourci de SPEED HIGHWAY Acte 2.
description.italian: Hai raccolto il Ring Stella rossa che si trova sulla scorciatoia dell'Atto 2 di SPEED HIGHWAY.
description.spanish: Has conseguido el Ring estrella roja en el atajo del acto 2 de SPEED HIGHWAY.
description.japanese: スピードハイウェイでショートカットルートにあるレッドスターリングをとった

description.english: Wrecked 30 or more cars in CITY ESCAPE.
description.german: Du hast in CITY ESCAPE Akt 2 30 oder mehr Autos demoliert.
description.french: Tu as détruit 30 voitures ou plus dans CITY ESCAPE Acte 2.
description.italian: Hai distrutto almeno 30 auto nell'Atto 2 di CITY ESCAPE.
description.spanish: Has destrozado 30 coches o más en el acto 2 de CITY ESCAPE.
description.japanese: シティエスケープでクルマを30台以上こわした

description.english: Got the Red Star Ring located in the hidden room in SEASIDE HILL.
description.german: Du hast dir den roten Sternenring geholt, der sich im geheimen Raum in SEASIDE HILL Akt 1 befindet.
description.french: Tu as attrapé la Ring Étoile rouge située dans la salle cachée de SEASIDE HILL Acte 1.
description.italian: Hai raccolto il Ring Stella rossa che si trova nella sala segreta dell'Atto 1 di SEASIDE HILL.
description.spanish: Has conseguido el Ring estrella roja de la sala secreta del acto 1 de SEASIDE HILL.
description.japanese: シーサイドヒルでかくされたへやのレッドスターリングをみつけた

description.english: Reached the goal in CRISIS CITY without being hit by a tornado-carried car.
description.german: Ziel in CRISIS CITY Akt 2 erreicht, ohne von einem Auto aus dem Wirbelsturm getroffen zu werden.
description.french: Tu as atteint l'arrivée de Crisis City Acte 2 sans te faire toucher par les voitures déplacées.
description.italian: Hai tagliato il traguardo dell'Atto 2 di CRISIS CITY senza farti colpire dalle auto trasportate
description.spanish: Llegaste a la meta en el acto 2 de CRISIS CITY sin que te diera ningún coche arrastrado
description.japanese: クライシスシティでたつまきのクルマにあたらずにゴールした

displayName.italian: Il Ring sul tetto che scotta

description.english: Got the Red Star Ring atop the highest spot in ROOFTOP RUN.
description.german: Du hast dir in ROOFTOP RUN Akt 2 den roten Sternenring vom höchsten Punkt geholt.
description.french: Tu as obtenu la Ring Étoile rouge située sur le plus haut point de ROOFTOP RUN Acte 2.
description.italian: Hai raccolto il Ring Stella rossa che si trova nel punto più alto dell'Atto 2 di ROOFTOP RUN.
description.spanish: Has conseguido el Ring estrella roja que está en el punto más alto del acto 2 de ROOFTOP RUN.
description.japanese: ルーフトップランでいちばんたかいところにあるレッドスターリングをとった

description.english: Got the Red Star Ring by using an Orange Wisp in PLANET WISP.
description.german: Du hast dir in PLANET WISP Akt 2 einen roten Sternenring mit einem orangefarbenen Wisp geholt.
description.french: Tu as obtenu la Ring Étoile rouge en te servant d'un Wisp orange dans PLANET WISP Acte 2.
description.italian: Hai raccolto il Ring Stella rossa usando un Wisp arancione nell'Atto 2 di PLANET WISP.
description.spanish: Has conseguido el Ring estrella roja usando un wisp naranja en el acto 2 de PLANET WISP.
description.japanese: プラネットウィスプでロケットファントムをつかってレッドスターリングをとった

description.english: Cleared a regular stage as Super Sonic.
description.german: Du bist als Super Sonic durch ein normales Level gerast.
description.french: Tu as traversé une étape normale à toute allure avec Super Sonic.
description.italian: Hai superato una fase normale come Super Sonic.
description.spanish: Has superado una fase normal como Super Sonic.
description.japanese: スーパーソニックでつうじょうステージをクリアした

displayName.japanese: カスタム　コンプリート！

description.english: Got all custom skills.
description.german: Du hast alle Fähigkeiten erhalten.
description.french: Tu as obtenu toutes les compétences personnalisées.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto tutte le abilità personalizzabili.
description.spanish: Has conseguido todas las habilidades personalizadas.
description.japanese: カスタムスキルをすべててにいれた

displayName.japanese: コレクション　コンプリート！

description.english: Got all collectibles.

description.italian: Hai ottenuto tutti gli oggetti collezionabili.
description.spanish: Has conseguido todos los objetos coleccionables.
description.japanese: コレクションをすべててに入れた

displayName.japanese: タイムアタックコンプリート！

description.english: Played Time Attack on all stages.

description.spanish: Has jugado a una Contrarreloj en todas las fases.
description.japanese: すべてのステージでタイムアタックをした

displayName.japanese: スペシャルリングコンプリート

description.english: Got all Red Star Rings.
description.german: Du hast dir alle roten Sternenringe geholt.
description.french: Tu as ramassé toutes les Rings Étoile rouge
description.italian: Hai ottenuto tutti i Ring Stella rossa.
description.spanish: Has conseguido todos los Rings estrella roja.
description.japanese: レッドスターリングをすべててにいれた

description.english: Cleared half the missions.
description.german: Du hast die Hälfte aller Herausforderungen abgeschlossen.
description.french: Tu as terminé la moitié des défis.
description.italian: Hai superato la metà delle sfide.
description.spanish: Has superado la mitad de los desafíos.

displayName.japanese: ミッション　コンプリート

description.english: Cleared all the missions.
description.german: Du hast alle Herausforderungen abgeschlossen.
